name: Pendulum Postman (LD49)
description:
Sometimes, carrying too many packages makes your body feel like a pendulum.

The busy streets may not be the best environment for carrying delicate mail... but that's why you're getting paid this much!

Deliver packages through an obstacle filled and dangerous path!

Be careful with your movement, avoid loosing packages!

Made by me and my friend!

Patch 1.1 changelog:

Fix baked lighting on some objects, Disabled a cheat keybind.
